word: H6059 - עָנַק - ʻânaq - aw-nak' - Compass about as a chain - ஒரு சங்கிலி போல சுற்றி வளை

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Compass about as a chain / ஒரு சங்கிலி போல சுற்றி வளை
to serve as a necklace, to adorn with a neck or nament
a) (Qal) to serve as a necklace

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to choke; used only as denominative from H6060, to collar, that is, adorn with a necklace; figuratively to fit out with supplies: - compass about as a chain, furnish, liberally.
Cognate: H6059, H6060, H6061, H6062, H6063
